content.Description: The earliest record datetime to sync as a UNIX timestamp
Set to true to sync only favorite items, false to sync only non-favorite items, or omit to sync all items
The content type of items to sync. By default, all content types are synced.
Type of item state to sync. By default, all states are synced.
The tag to sync. By default, all tags are synced. Use _untagged_ to sync untagged items.
Config object for stream maps capability. For more information check out Stream Maps.
User-defined config values to be used within map expressions.
'True' to enable schema flattening and automatically expand nested properties.
The max depth to flatten schemas.
